title: Scapegoating Russia - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/6/17
itunes:title: Scapegoating Russia - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/6/17
description:
George Noory and guest Dan Kovalik discuss his theory that Russia and Vladimir Putin are getting framed for all the charges of interfering with the 2016 election and causing unrest to other democracies around the world.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
